group_1.textLeft: We're bringing you today's show from our usual@recording studio[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.4][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:103601:motion_200][chara:103601:lipSynch_1][chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]â€”[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:lipSynch_1] BUT!
Actually, we've got some surprise special guests@in store for you tonight!

group_1.textRight: As I recall, they're the ones who gained fame@among the students of Yukuni...
You know, you promised before that you wouldn't@talk about Magical Girls anymore.
But I suppose this is our way of making up for@all the trouble we've caused...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's why I agreed to bring them onto@the show.
I hope all of you watching right now can forgive me.
So, without further ado, I'd like to introduce the@three people who will be joining us today.
This is Rabi Himuro-san, Asahi Miura-san, and@Alexandra Kurusu-san, alright?

group_1.textRight: Well... What did you all come to talk about today?
Your appearance seems to have been decided on@short notice, so it's not in the script.

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, aside from an email from our guests,
I haven't been told anything about it either.
However, seeing as we've been getting a lot of@emails about Magical Girl sightings,
and there are still rumors going around@among students,
I'm sure everyone in the audience is curious@about it, right?

group_1.textRight: But all I hear are terrible stories about Magical@Girls killing people...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe that's what they've come here to discuss?

group_1.textRight: I'd like to discuss matters regarding us Magical Girls@and what happened at the Festival.
I'm going to take a moment at the beginning of@tonight's show to briefly address this.
So please, bear with me until the end.

group_1.textLeft: Kurara and I will listen quietly, so please continue.

group_1.narration: "I'm sure many of the students watching this broadcast@are already aware of our existence as Magical Girls@and our daily battles against curse-spreading Witches."
"Moreover, you might also know that we Magical Girls@can become curse-spreading Witches ourselves..."
"That's why I think the majority of people believe@that Magical Girls are actually Witches,@but that's not the truth..."
"To become a Witch is equivalent to death for us."
"No one becomes a Witch by choice,@and many Magical Girls are unaware@of the painful fate awaiting them@if they are not careful."
"In fact, it's only recently that@even the three of us have learned the truth@about what it means to turn into a Witch."
"So, if you find yourselves indiscriminately hunting down@Magical Girls, please cease your actions."
"We continue to fight to prevent people@from being harmed by Witches.@However, if our hearts become tainted with darkness,@we will become Witches ourselves@and bring harm to Yukuni City."
"That Magical Girls run away when they become@Witches is merely a myth, and it is not retribution."
"Now then, I'm sure some of you are wondering@how Magical Girls can put an end to the@incidents and accidents that have occurred..."
"Unfortunately, there are only a limited number@of Magical Girls, so it's impossible to prevent all@disasters and tragedies from taking place."

"Large-scale natural disasters like avalanches and@earthquakes can't be dealt with after they occur.@Even if we discover what's happening and fight@the Witches responsible, if we're not strong enough,@then they will kill us."
"However, I don't want to brush this off by@saying that we had no choice."
"I assure you, the suffering you've endured@is solely due to our negligence@and the blame lies entirely with the three of us."
"Other Magical Girls have worked hard and@averted disasters, but we gave up and did nothing."
"At the very least, the accident at the recent Festival@could have been handled by the three of us,@but we failed to do anything at the scene."
"So please, I hope you'll leave the uninvolved@Magical Girls out of this."
"We'll atone for our own sins, so please spare@the other Magical Girls from your ire."
